statements.select: SELECT AA.SALE_ID , AA.SALE_NO , AA.SALE_DATE , AA.SALE_TYPE , AA.CUSTOMER_ID , BB.CUSTOMER_NAME , AA.REMARKS , AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER FROM UBZ.SALE_TRAN AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.CUSTOMERS BB ON AA.CUSTOMER_ID = BB.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.SALE_ID = #SALE_ID#

SELECT AA.SALE_ITEM_ID , AA.SALE_ID , AA.PRODUCT_ID , BB.PRODUCT_NAME , AA.SALE_PRICE , AA.SALE_QTY , AA.SALE_AMT
, AA.INS_TIME , AA.INS_USER , U1.USER_NAME AS INS_USER_NAME , AA.UPD_TIME , AA.UPD_USER , U2.USER_NAME AS UPD_USER_NAME
FROM UBZ.SALE_TRAN_ITEM AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN UCD.PRODUCTS BB ON AA.PRODUCT_ID = BB.PRODUCT_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.INS_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN UAA.USERS U2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.UPD_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE AA.SALE_ID = #SALE_ID# ORDER BY AA.SALE_ITEM_ID
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.SALE_TRAN ( SALE_NO, SALE_DATE, SALE_TYPE, CUSTOMER_ID, REMARKS, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #SALE_NO#, #SALE_DATE#, #SALE_TYPE#, #CUSTOMER_ID#, #REMARKS#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS SALE_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.SALE_TRAN SET SALE_DATE = #SALE_DATE# , SALE_TYPE = #SALE_TYPE# , CUSTOMER_ID = #CUSTOMER_ID# , REMARKS = #REMARKS# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE SALE_ID = #SALE_ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM UBZ.SALE_TRAN WHERE SALE_ID = #SALE_ID#; DELETE FROM UBZ.SALE_TRAN_ITEM WHERE SALE_ID = #SALE_ID#
statements.select: SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SALE_NO), #SALE_NO#+'000') AS SALE_NO FROM UBZ.SALE_TRAN AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.SALE_NO LIKE #SALE_NO# + '%'
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO UBZ.SALE_TRAN_ITEM ( SALE_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SALE_PRICE, SALE_QTY, SALE_AMT, INS_TIME, INS_USER ) VALUES ( #SALE_ID#, #PRODUCT_ID#, #SALE_PRICE#, #SALE_QTY#, #SALE_AMT#, GETDATE(), #INS_USER# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS SALE_ITEM_ID
statements.update: UPDATE UBZ.SALE_TRAN SET PRODUCT_ID = #PRODUCT_ID# , SALE_PRICE = #SALE_PRICE# , SALE_QTY = #SALE_QTY# , SALE_AMT = #SALE_AMT# , UPD_TIME = GETDATE() , UPD_USER = #INS_USER# WHERE SALE_ITEM_ID = #SALE_ITEM_ID#
